title: The Dallas Morning News
summary: The Dallas Morning News is a daily newspaper serving the Dallasâ€“Fort Worth area of Texas, with an average of 271,900 daily subscribers. It was founded on October 1, 1885, by Alfred Horatio Belo as a satellite publication of the Galveston Daily News, of Galveston, Texas.[2] Historically, and to the present day, it is the most prominent newspaper in Dallas.[2]
